OOC: I hit send too early. The rest of the message: Moon Mist, post for
BrightBlade, Klant is just standing there doing nothing! It's like I don't
even have him! Please?...

BIC: Klant waits for BrightBlade to counter attack...
----- Original Message -----
From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 19, 2000 5:53 PM
Subject: Sky Lynx...


> Great new character, buddy. Maybe some interaction with Klant can be in
> order. But Klant can't move until Moon Mist posts for BrightBlade again.
> That's unfair, she just comes on to post for Rage because someone caught
her
> little base intruder!...
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Alloran2@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, October 18, 2000 9:14 PM
> Subject: Sky Lynx
>
>
> > OOC:Tell me what ya think about this char introduction
> >
> > :::Sky Lynx:::
> >
> > ::The great shuttle had been flying through space for some time now.  he
> had
> > left Cybertron long ago when he was unaccepted by the Maximals.  Why are
> all
> > these veterans shunned? His Shuttle mode was as big as ever, but his
bird
> and
> > lynx forms were considerably smaller now.  He went to a place he hadnt
> flown
> > to in centuries.  It was a place known as earth.  He wondered what was
> going
> > on there now::
> > Computer: Warning, this zone is off limits by the high council
> > Sky Lynx: Slag the high council!
> > ::He flies down to the planet and learns that he is in past earth, and
> that
> > there is a great war going on::
> > Sky Lynx: Well, i must offer my services.
> > ::He goes to the CF and opens a comm::
> > Sky Lynx: I would like to join you maximals.  Do you accept?
